name: @devup-ui/plugin-utils
description: Shared utilities for Devup UI build plugins
author: devfive

scripts.build: tsc && bun build --target node src/index.ts --production --env=disable --outfile dist/index.cjs --format cjs --packages external && bun build --target node src/index.ts --production --env=disable --outfile dist/index.mjs --format esm --packages external
